==Translingual==
{{Han simplified forms|豐|豊|丰}}

===Etymology===
Japanese shinjitai {{Han simp|豐}}.

In current form, graphically {{Han compound|曲|豆}} – the bottom is cognate to {{m|zh|豆}} (both being a pot on a stand), while {{m|zh|曲}} is etymologically unrelated, being just a graphical simplification. The simplification of the top to {{lang|zh|曲}} dates back to seal characters, where it was a variant.
